hero_subtext: Easily design forms and capture responses without coding or complicated setups.
form_description_0: Tell us your thoughts about our latest product
form_description_1: Reserve your spot for the Miami event
form_description_2: Share your experience with your most recent order
form_description_3: Share your opinion on what matters most
form_description_4: Let us know how we can assist you
feature-1-desc: A simple yet powerful form builder with a visual drag-and-drop interface. Supports multi-section forms and flexible layouts, allowing multiple element types to be placed within the same section.
feature-3-desc: Publish the form in a few clicks and begin collecting responses without extra delays.
feature-4-desc: Gain insight into your audience from data points like submission time and respondents' OS.
feature-5-desc: Responses are encrypted using advanced cryptography with a key known only to the respondent and the form author.
feature-6-desc: Forms adjust to different screen sizes, providing a smooth experience on mobile as well as tablet and desktop.
invalid-email-error: Please enter a valid email address.
password-too-short-error: Password must be at least 12 characters long.
uploading_mlkem_public_key_to_firebase: Uploading ML-KEM public key to Firebase
dont-forget-email-verification: Don't forget to verify your Email!
failed_to_upload_mlkem_public_key_to_fir: Failed to upload ML-KEM public key to Firebase.
cant_log_in_in_to_newly_created_account: Can't log in to the newly created account.
uploading_mlkem_private_key_to_firebase: Uploading ML-KEM private key to Firebase
authentication-error-line1: Oops! It looks like you're signed out.
authentication-error-line2: Press OK and sign in to your account.
public-key-for-mlkem-1024-fingerprint-er: Error occurred! Click to learn more.
cryptographic_identity_info_line1: Below is the hash of your public key for ML-KEM-1024.
cryptographic_identity_info_line2: Respondents can use it to confirm your identity.
cryptographic_identity_info_line3: No need to keep it secret, this value is public.
cryptographic_identity_info_for_signup_l: Here's the hash of your ML-KEM-1024 public key.
This value must match the one in the dashboard.
Respondents can use it to confirm your identity.
No need to keep it secret, this value is public.
identity_check_title: Fingerprint of the ML-KEM-1024 public key for:
identity_check_form_subtitle: Enter user's email to get the fingerprint of their public key for ML-KEM-1024
author: Author
title: Title
label: Label
delete_item_confirm_line1: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
reorder_hint: You can rearrange sections and elements within them by dragging them.
text-anywhere: The text can be anywhere in the section
confirm_form_discard: Are you sure you want to discard this form?
email_verification_description: To create and publish forms, your email address must be verified. Please verify your email and log in again to access this feature.
error_template_corrupt: Encrypted form template has invalid encoding
error_key_corrupt: Encrypted form key has invalid encoding
error_key_integrity: Decrypted form key integrity is compromised
error_template_integrity: Integrity of a decrypted form template is compromised
error_padding_invalid: Padding of the decrypted form template is invalid
you-can-share-it-by-providing-the-tag-be: Share the tag below with the recipients:
publish_form_confirm_line1: Are you sure you want to make this form public?
publish_form_confirm_line3: Once published, the form can't be edited.
form-id-missing: Form ID is missing in the URL.
publisher_key_fetch_failed: Can't get form creator's public key.
invalid-encoding-of-the-encrypted-form-t: Failed to decode the encrypted form.
publisher_key_not_found: Can't get form author's public key.
publisher_key_invalid: Form author's public key is invalid
form_submitted_successfully: Your response has been submitted successfully.
submit_another_response: Click here to submit another response
responses_mlkem_key_missing: ML-KEM private key not found in Firestore.
responses_mlkem_key_corrupt: ML-KEM private key encoding is invalid.
responses_mlkem_key_decrypt_fail: Failed to decrypt ML-KEM private key.
error_response_padding_invalid: Padding of the decrypted response is invalid
error_decapsulation_failed: Failed to decapsulate ML-KEM shared secret
delete_response_confirm_line1: Are you sure you want to delete this response?
log-out-confirm-line: Are you sure you want to log out?
profile_settings_description: Manage your account information and cryptographic keys.
mlkem_keypair_generated_success: New ML-KEM-1024 key pair generated successfully.
are_you_sure_generate_mlkem: Are you sure you want to generate a new ML-KEM-1024 key pair?
mlkem_warning_1: You will lose the ability to decrypt the responses you currently have.
mlkem_warning_2: The fingerprint of your public key for ML-KEM-1024 visible to recipients will change.
credit-text: The existence of this project (at least in its current form) wouldn't have been possible without the following:
delete_form_confirm_line1: Are you sure you want to delete this form?
delete_form_confirm_line2: For public forms, all responses associated with this form will also be deleted.
responder_form_input_open_link: Looking to fill out the form? Click here.
responder_form_input_modal_inscription: Paste a tag and press 'Load form' to continue.
the_form_could_not_be_loaded_please_chec: The form could not be loaded. Please check your tag and try again.
